content.description: Which of the following indicates whether the net charge of the original, unstable nucleus is equal to or unequal to the net charge of the decay products for Reaction <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math> and Reaction <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math>?
content.question: Reaction <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math>: Net Charge of Original Nucleus and Decay ProductsReaction <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math>: Net Charge of Original Nucleus and Decay ProductsAEqualEqualBEqualUnequalCUnequalEqualDUnequalUnequal

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
